sentences.en: “a parent who asks a child, ‘Would you like to pig out on pizza?’”(&b{George F. Will})
sentences.cn: “一位问孩子，‘你想大吃一次意大利比萨饼吗?’的家长”(&b{乔治F.威尔})

sentences.en: "A talking pig!" he exclaimed. "Well, I'll be darned."
sentences.cn: “一只会说话的猪!”他大声叫道，“哎呀，真是怪事。”

sentences.en: Every part of the pig is useful.
He butchered the pig with a small sharp knife.
sentences.cn: 他用一把锋利的小刀杀猪.

sentences.en: He can be intransigent and pig - headed at times.
sentences.cn: 他有时候会很固执,寸步不让.

sentences.en: He is one of the outstanding pig - breeders of the commune.
sentences.cn: 在公社里,他是数得着的养猪能手.

sentences.en: I am not sure whether this was courage or pig-headedness.
sentences.cn: 我不能肯定这是一种勇气，还是一种固执。

sentences.en: I hate working for that male chauvinist pig Steve.
sentences.cn: 我讨厌给史蒂夫这个可恶的大男子主义者干活。

sentences.en: I'm afraid I made a pig of myself at dinner.
sentences.cn: 恐怕我晚餐时吃得太多了。

sentences.en: Pig - breeding not only improves the people's diet; it makes more manure available.
sentences.cn: 养猪不独可以改善人民生活, 还能多积肥料.

sentences.en: Pig iron may contain 4％ of carbon.
sentences.cn: 生铁可含百分之四的碳.

sentences.en: The pig rose squealing and bolted.
sentences.cn: 那头猪突然嗷嗷叫着狂奔起来。

sentences.en: The pig stores a lot of fat in its body.
sentences.cn: 猪在体内储存了大量的脂肪.

sentences.en: They made sorghum into pig feed.
sentences.cn: 他们把高粱做成了猪饲料.

sentences.en: Wild boar readily hybridises with the domestic pig.
sentences.cn: 野猪很容易和家猪杂交。

sentences.en: You greedy pig! You've already had two helpings!
sentences.cn: 你这个馋嘴！你已经吃了两份了！

phrases.tran_cn: 瞎买的东西；盲目接受的东西
[俚语]向睡着的人泼冷水(把他弄醒)
[食人生番用语](人肉宴席上的)人肉
(爱尔兰，非正式)享受悠闲、奢侈生活的
在形式上掩盖了真实特性或价值的东西
狼吞虎咽地大吃；大吃特吃
狼吞虎咽：狼吞虎咽地吃；大吃
◎暴发户；一步登天的人；行为粗鲁的有钱人

phrases.phrase: squeal or yell like a stuck pig

phrases.tran_cn: adv. 永无可能；决不可能

trans.tran_cn: 猪，猪肉，令人不快（或讨厌）的人，金属块（锭）
trans.tran_en: a farm animal with short legs, a fat body and a curved tail. Pigs are kept for their meat, which includes  pork  ,  bacon  and  ham  .
a farm animal with short legs, a fat body and a curved tail. Pigs are kept for their meat, which includes  pork  ,  bacon  and  ham  .

trans.tran_cn: 使贪婪地吃，使拼命大吃
